short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for authentication with soex.io

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SOEX is an extension for accessing all apps that support SOEX in the regular Chrome browser, which allows users to create and manage their own identities, so when a Web App wants to perform a signature, the user is given a secure interface to review it before approving or rejecting it.
